Summary: I saw 2 UFOs moving in a clockwise pattern
divs: Sighting DetailsI was having my coffee break at work when I observed the first object. I saw itmoving in a circular pattern.I thought it was a white pigeon.When it acendedinto a cloud and came back out again I went out to get a better look and saw the2nd object. It was identical to the first moving in same circular pattern as ufo1.They both moved to the NE.and still moving in circular pattern.They wentbehind a cloud bank this is when I lost sight of them.This was a daylightobservation.I was quite surprised by this event.All I require from this reportis a logical explanation of what I may have wittnessed.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around December 7th 2003
